question: Inzira nyabagendwa ifite ibyerekezo bibiri, uruhande rw'ibumoso rudufasha iki ?

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ku kinyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntikigomba  kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:

options: Iyo ikimenyetso kimurika cyagenewe ibinyabiziga kidakora
Iyo nta cyapa cyo gutambuka mbere gihari
Ibisubizo byose bibanza ni byo by'ukuri
question: Ni ryari itegeko rigenga gutambuka mbere kw'iburyo rikurikizwa mu masangano:
Mu bitegekwa n' umukozi ubifitiye ububasha kuzunguza itara ritukura bitegeka guhagarara nde?

options: Cyarengeje santimetero 30 uvuye ku nkengero z'umuhanda
Cyahagaze ahanditse ko nta guhagarara byemewe
question: Ni irihe kosa iki kinyabiziga cyakoze?

options: Tanga inzira ku binyabiziga bigenda mu muhanda munini wegera
Tanga inzira ku ibinyabiziga biturutse iburyo bwawe
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki mu nkomane?
Imburira zimurika zemerewe gukoreshwa kugirango bamenyeshe umuyobozi ko  bagiye kumunyuraho aha hakurikira:
Umuyobozi ashobora akongera umuvuduko gutambuka vuba?

options: Ishusho y'uruziga mu ibara ry'ubururu ni ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
Ishusho mpandeshatu ubuso mu ibara ryera ikirango mu ibara ry'umukara
Ishusho mpandenye ubuso mu ibara ry'ubururu n'ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
question: Icyapa cyerekana ko hari amabwiriza yihariye mu buryo bwo kugendera mu cyambu  cyangwa ku kibuga cy'indege giteye ku buryo bukurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
Uretse mu mijyi kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu  n'abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite  imitambiko ibiri ni:

options: Ni bibi ku kinyabiziga cy'imitende ibiri
Ni bibi ku kinyabiziga cy'imitende ine
question: Gutwara uzungazunga mu muhanda:

options: Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara ibintu birengeje toni 3.5
question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba gukorerwa isuzumwa rimwe mu mezi 6:

options: Imbere y'ahantu nyabagendwa hinjirwa n'ahasohokerwa n'abantu benshi
Mu muhanda aho ugabanyijemo ibisate bigaragazwa n'imirongo icagaguye
Mu muhanda aho ugabanyijemo ibisate bigaragazwa n'imirongo idacagaguye
question: Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira :
Kunyuranaho bikorerwa:

options: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba gufata iyo nkoni nk'icyapa kimumenyesha  ko agomba guhagarara
question: Mu gihe Umuntu ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona yambuka umuhanda yitwaje inkoni  yera y'abatabona:

options: mu ruhande ruteganye n'urwo ikindi kinyabiziga gihagazemo akanya gato  cyangwa kanini
ku mihanda ibisikanirwamo iyo ubugari bw'umwanya w'ibinyabiziga ugomba  gutuma bibisikana butagifite m12
question: Guhagarara akanya gato no guhagarara akanya kanini bibujijwe cyane cyane aha  hakurikira:

options: itara ritukura cyangwa akagarurarumuri ku mutuku ku manywa
agatambaro gatukura gafite nibura cm 50 z'uruhande mu ijoro
question: Iyo amatara y'ikinyabiziga agomba gucanwa kandi igihe imizigo isumba impera  y'ikinyabiziga ho metero irenga igice gihera cy'imizigo kigaragazwa ku buryo  bukurikira:

options: Ipikipi idafite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande
Ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande, na velomoteri
question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaritswe nijoro ku buryo abayobozi bakigana badashobora kumenya ko kibabereye imbogamiz, kigomba kurangirwa kure n' ikimenyetso cyabigenewe kiri ahantu hagaragara kugirango kiburire hakiri kare abandi bayobozi baza bagisanga, ariko ibyo ntibireba ibinyabiziga bikurikira
Ni iyihe feri ituma imodoka igenda buhoro kandi igahagarara ku buryo bwizewe bubangutse kandi nyabwo, uko imodoka yaba yikoreye kose yaba igeze ahacuramye cyangwa ahaterera:
